ajito_doku_040_system_01: About a year and a half ago...
ajito_doku_040_dokuboss_01:
Forgive me. It took a goodly time to procure
the required materials.[VAR 0114(0023)]
ajito_doku_040_honooboss_01: Whoaaa, sick! These boots are insaaaaaane![VAR 0114(001F)]
ajito_doku_040_dokuboss_02:
Ah, yes. The move Flame Charge was my muse
for those particular pieces.[VAR 0114(0023)]
ajito_doku_040_kakutouboss_01:
This outfit is everything I imagined it would be.
Thank you so much![VAR 0114(0022)]
ajito_doku_040_dokuboss_03:
I merely wished to create a costume worthy of
the great Infernal Eri. If it aligns with your vision,\r
then I am content.[VAR 0114(0023)]
ajito_doku_040_akuboss_01:
Seems our outfit upgrades are all wrapped up,
then! Thanks a ton, Atticus.[VAR 0114(0021)]
ajito_doku_040_akuboss_02:
With you two lookin’ like absolute beasts,
anyone who crosses us will be sweatin’ bullets![VAR 0114(0021)]
ajito_doku_040_fairyboss_01:
You’re so good at these sorts of crafty things,
Atticus.[VAR 0114(0020)]
ajito_doku_040_fairyboss_02:
Those people bullying you ’cause you geek out
over old-fashioned stuff are out of their minds.[VAR 0114(0020)]
ajito_doku_040_dokuboss_04:
The way of the ninja is rough and fraught with
thorns. I neither expect nor desire sympathy from\r
the unrefined rabble.[VAR 0114(0023)]
ajito_doku_040_honooboss_02:
Oooh, someone’s gettin’ fired up! Watch out,
world—our Atticus has FIGHTIN’ words![VAR 0114(001F)]
ajito_doku_040_kakutouboss_02:
Yeah, don’t listen to the haters, Atticus. I think
you’re really cool![VAR 0114(0022)]
ajito_doku_040_akuboss_03:
All right, gang. Let’s move on to the next step.\c
It’s time to put our backs into our battle training
so we’re all prepped for Operation Star.[VAR 0114(0021)]
ajito_doku_040_akuboss_04:
We gotta be stronger than everyone else in the
team—that’s what bein’ a boss means![VAR 0114(0021)]
ajito_doku_040_dokuboss_05:
Indeed it does. Henceforth, I will devote myself
heart and soul to honing my battle skills![VAR 0114(0023)]
ajito_doku_040_dokuboss_06:
For the sake of the team, I would give my very
heart and soul...but I cannot defy the rules.[VAR 0114(0023)]
ajito_doku_040_dokuboss_08:
And so...this badge is mine to keep no more.
I entrust it to thy care.[VAR 0114(0023)]
ajito_doku_040_waza_01:
Take this contraption, too. It contains a technique
that allows one to cover their foes in gunk.[VAR 0114(0023)]
ajito_doku_040_dokuboss_09:
[VAR BD06(0000)][VAR TRNAME(0000)] is thy name,
is it not?[VAR 0114(0023)]
ajito_doku_040_dokuboss_10:
You have utterly bested me. But thy victory stir’d
no bitterness within me—such was its brilliance.[VAR 0114(0023)]
ajito_doku_040_nelke_01:
It seems this little fella has been dying to speak
with you face-to-face.[VAR 0114(001E)]
ajito_doku_040_student_02:
Don Atticus, please, hear what I have to say!
I only need a moment!
ajito_doku_040_dokuboss_13: Whatever brought you all the way here?[VAR 0114(0023)]
ajito_doku_040_student_04:
If you don’t start going to class again, you’ll be
expelled from the academy, right?
ajito_doku_040_student_05:
When the other kids at school and I were getting
bullied real bad, you and the rest of Team Star\r
saved us!
ajito_doku_040_student_06:
Thanks to that operation you carried out,
we were all able to go to school again!
ajito_doku_040_student_07:
If you got expelled for being the good guys,
that’d be the worst thing ever!
ajito_doku_040_student_08: Haven’t you heard anything from the big boss...?
ajito_doku_040_dokuboss_16:
Nay, we’ve heard not a whisper since that
fateful day...[VAR 0114(0023)]
ajito_doku_040_dokuboss_17:
Without the big boss, Team Star cannot carry on.\c
And without the team, the bright and merry
student life we seek lies beyond our reach![VAR 0114(0023)]
ajito_doku_040_dokuboss_18:
We’ve no choice but to defend our bases till
the big boss returns to us![VAR 0114(0023)]
ajito_doku_040_student_09:
You evidently trust this big boss of yours a great
deal. Who exactly are they?[VAR 0114(001E)]
ajito_doku_040_dokuboss_20: In truth, not one of us has met them in the flesh.[VAR 0114(0023)]
ajito_doku_040_dokuboss_21:
By their own word, they are a recluse. As with the
rest of us, ’twould seem bullying was to blame.[VAR 0114(0023)]
ajito_doku_040_dokuboss_22:
Though their name and face be unknown to us,
they are nonetheless our precious comrade.\c
Our only choice is to maintain our vigils from
the bases, awaiting the day of their return.[VAR 0114(0023)]
ajito_doku_040_student_13: So that’s why you don’t go to school...
ajito_doku_040_student_14:
But...but still! Don’t ever think that Team Star is
all you have, Don Atticus!\c
You’ve got a lifelong compadre in me—and don’t
you forget it!
ajito_doku_040_dokuboss_24: I owe you a great debt.[VAR 0114(0023)]
ajito_doku_040_nelke_03:
It seems we’re one step closer to the truth behind
Team Star’s truancy—and the bullying at the\r
academy. But more importantly...[VAR 0114(001E)]
ajito_doku_040_nelke_04:
I can’t believe I had no idea about these issues
the students are struggling with...\c
They have friendships they hold dear and reasons
for acting as they do. I just couldn’t see it.[VAR 0114(001E)]
ajito_doku_040_nelke_05: It’s shameful how oblivious I’ve been.[VAR 0114(001E)]
ajito_doku_040_dokuboss_25:
Haaah... I believ’d Team Star to be the one and
only treasure in my life...[VAR 0114(0023)]
ajito_doku_040_dokuboss_26: Methinks I may have been mistaken.[VAR 0114(0023)]
